Leon's Personal Blog v.1.9.8.4

Week 8

22 Jun 2020 This week I polished the simplified tangles. I am planning to create a site using the knot atlas template, to display invariants for each tangle.

Week 7

15 Jun 2020 This week I redrew some capped trivial tangles. I tried to draw them as simplified as possible.

Week 6

08 Jun 2020 I moved the Capped-Trivial-Tangles to a different site so I could add some buttons that show the construction of the tangle.

Week 5

01 Jun 2020 This week I drew some more Capped Trivial Tangles. I also learned about a bit about the refined khovanov homology. I am excited to learn more about spectral sequences!

Chain Complexes

27 May 2020

Letâ€™s begin with some geometry. Take a piece of paper. Roll it up into a cylinder by gluing along an edge. Then fold the ends into a doughnut shape by gluing along a circle.

Here is a hard question to answer. Is there a way to deform the doughnut back into the flat piece of paper with using scissors?

If you try it yourself you would probably guess not. One of the things you might say is a problem is that the donut has this hole in the middle.
